summary: This is an email correspondence from August 12, 2019, detailing the schedule for an inmate companion assigned to Jeffrey Epstein from July 23-24, 2019, and noting Epstein's transfer to psych observation on July 24, 2019. It appears to be an internal administrative communication regarding inmate monitoring at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who was transferred to psych observation on July 24, 2019, and was assigned an inmate companion.

events.title: Inmate Companion Assumes Duties
events.description: An inmate companion assumed duties for Jeffrey Epstein from staff at 7:00 am.

events.title: Epstein Transferred to Psych Observation
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was transferred to psych observation at 8:45 am, where an inmate companion was utilized.

events.title: Psych Observation Period Ends
events.description: The psych observation period for Jeffrey Epstein ended at 8:15 am.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: An inmate companion was assigned to monitor Jeffrey Epstein from July 23, 2019, at 7:00 am until July 24, 2019, at 8:45 am.
Jeffrey Epstein was transferred to psych observation on July 24, 2019, at 8:45 am.
Epstein remained in psych observation until July 30, 2019, at 8:15 am, during which time an inmate companion was utilized.
The document is an internal email dated August 12, 2019, referencing these events, which occurred shortly before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
